string.name: large_text
string.b:
WELCOME."
Construction Management System is Used for helping keep Record of Workers and Raw Material used into construction or Which Raw Material are Required in further Construction.
Important for Customers,Contractor and Builder who want to know about what going on it's site and what action might be Required. this app.
We provides the following Features in Our System:
->Show the status of site. ->Workers Information. ->Material Status. ->Previous Work Details. ->Gallery ->payment Receipt.
Includes wireless features for anytime,anywhere communication.User can message if they have to know anything about construction system and admin give them reply related to their question.
Thank you.
